content: काश् {c1c} {c4c} <ab>A.</ab> (काश-श्य-ते, काशित) {@--1@} To shine, look brilliant or beautiful; <ls>R. 10. 86</ls>, <ls n="R.">7. 24</ls>; <ls>Ku. 1. 24</ls>; <ls>Bk. 2. 25</ls>; <ls>Śi. 6. 74.</ls> {@--2@} To appear, be visible; नैव भूमिर्न च दिशः प्रदिशो वा चकाशिरे <ls>Mb.</ls> {@--3@} To appear, or look like.
